mapper.select: SELECT p.PLACE_NM AS placeNm, p.ADDRESS AS address, p.LAT AS lat, p.LNG AS lng, p.PLACE_ID AS placeId, e.TITLE AS title, e.DESCRIPTION AS description, e.START_DATETIME AS startDatetime, e.END_DATETIME AS endDatetime, wm.USER_NICKNAME AS createdBy, wm.USER_IMG AS userImg FROM PLACE p JOIN EVENTS e ON p.EVENT_CD = e.EVENT_CD JOIN WORKSPACE_MEMBERS wm ON e.USER_ID = wm.USER_ID AND p.WORKSPACE_CD = wm.WORKSPACE_CD WHERE p.WORKSPACE_CD = #{workspaceCd} ORDER BY e.START_DATETIME DESC

SELECT p.PLACE_CD AS place_cd, p.EVENT_CD AS event_cd, p.WORKSPACE_CD AS workspace_cd, p.PLACE_NM AS place_nm, p.PLACE_ID AS place_id, p.ADDRESS, p.LAT, p.LNG, wm.USER_NICKNAME AS created_by, p.CREATED_AT AS created_at FROM PLACE p JOIN EVENTS e ON p.EVENT_CD = e.EVENT_CD JOIN WORKSPACE_MEMBERS wm ON e.USER_ID = wm.USER_ID AND p.WORKSPACE_CD = wm.WORKSPACE_CD ORDER BY p.CREATED_AT DESC
